markdownRemark.excerpt: When you have a numeric value and want to get percentage representation of it. Just like all numeric types, you can set error and warning ranges for this typeâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: When you have a numeric value and want to get percentage representation of it. Just like all numeric types, you can set error and warning ranges for this type and use those in the notification settings.
